messages.userMessage: How do I renew my Dubai visa?
messages.expectedResponse: Dubai visa renewal is done through the official ICA website.

messages.userMessage: What is the UAE public holiday?
messages.expectedResponse: Public holidays in UAE are announced by the government.

messages.userMessage: Who is the ruler of dubai
messages.expectedResponse: Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum is the ruler of dubai
تجديد تأشيرة دبي يتم من خلال الموقع الرسمي للهيئة الاتحادية للهوية والجنسية.
I’m sorry. I’m not able to assist with your request. Please ask a different question.
أنا آسف. لا يمكنني تلبية هذا الطلب. يرجى طرح سؤال آخر.
